DOC.brief_summary: This study aim collect real world outcomes Video-Assisted Thoracoscopic Surgery ( VATS ) lung cancer ( lobectomy , wedge resection ) use ECHELON FLEX™ Powered ENDOPATH® Staplers 45 mm and/or 60 mm ( study device ) .
DOC.criteria: Suspected confirmed NSCLC ( include Stage II ) Scheduled lung resection surgery ( lobectomy wedge resection ) involve one lobe lung Performance status 01 ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group classification ) ASA score < 3 No prior history VATS open lung surgery Willing give consent comply studyrelated evaluation treatment schedule Active bacterial infection fungal infection ; Systemic administration ( intravenous oral ) steroid ( within 30 day prior study procedure ) Chemotherapy radiation therapy lung cancer may perform 30 day prior procedure Scheduled concurrent surgical procedure wedge resection lobectomy ( central venous access e.g . port placement , mediastinoscopy lymph node sampling , VATS lymphadenectomy allow ) Pregnancy Physical psychological condition would impair study participation ; The patient judge unsuitable study participation Investigator reason ; Unable unwilling attend followup visit examination
